rows.label: tlk41700121_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard that Divine Beast battleship got
attacked. And by a group of rebels
trying to save that wanted girl Nia, too!

rows.label: tlk41700121_03_msg0002
rows.name:
They must be a force to be reckoned
with. Even Meleph, Superbia's greatest
Driver, couldn't capture them.

rows.label: tlk41700121_03_msg0003
rows.name:
If she can't take them, there's nothing
us ordinary folk of Trigo can do.
Just gotta wait for this all to blow over.

rows.label: tlk41700121_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I only hope it doesn't get too
out of control. Don't want the
city getting damaged.
